channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Business Process Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Business Process Manager

item.title: CVE-2018-1384|2024-08-05T03:59:38.912Z -- ibm -- business%20process%20manager
item.description: IBM Business Process Manager 8.6 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 138135.
